title: Desired Affliction 1 by C.A. Harms
description:
One night and a huge mistake...how can that
change the life of one girl forever?

Lexi made a wrong choice to trust the wrong person.
She falls into darkness and begins spiraling out of control.
She is terrified of closeness and continues to end up in the
arms of the wrong men repeatedly. Kole reappears in her
life and something about him makes her run. Will he be the
man to make her realize that she isn't the person she has
become or will he be the one that erases
what little she has left of herself.




Desired Affliction 1
By C.A. Harms
Language: EN
Pages: EPUB 222
